original_text: and say to the land of Israel, Thus says the Lord: Behold, I am against you and will draw my sword from its sheath and will cut off from you both righteous and wicked.
korean_text: 이스라엘 땅에게 이르기를 여호와의 말씀에 내가 너를 대적하여 내 칼을 칼집에서 빼어 의인과 악인을 네게서 끊을지라

sentences.original_text: and say to the land of Israel,
and will draw my sword from its sheath
and will cut off from you both righteous and wicked.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에서 의인과 악인을 다 끊어 버리리라.
